title: Chicken, Thyme and Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '200g skinless chicken breast fillets, finely diced', '1 red onion, chopped', '1 garlic clove, chopped', '2 celery sticks, chopped', '250g button mushrooms, roughly chopped', '1 tbsp chopped fresh thyme or 1 tsp dried thyme, plus extra fresh thyme to garnish (optional)', '1 tbsp dry sherry', '1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce', '700ml chicken stock, made with stock cubes', '4 tbsp half-fat crème fraîche']
